resources.string: A short introduction and general overview
The Kubriko game engine is a lightweight, scalable, and easy-to-use solution for creating simple, 2D games that target the Android, Desktop (Windows, Linux, macOS), iOS, or Web platforms.

Kubriko is based on Compose Multiplatform, and is written 100% in Kotlin. As a result, it can seamlessly be integrated into any Compose project.\n\nFor more information, check out the GitHub repository. Kubriko is under active development and will evolve together with the games that are being created with it. It's completely open source and free to use under the Apache 2.0 license.
